content.text: Develop a CRM for law firms - should help manage cases, track billable hours, and store legal documents. Include features for case management, time tracking, legal workflows, team task delegation, client profiles with case history, and court date reminders.

Develop a CRM for law firms - should help manage cases, track billable hours, and store legal documents. Include features for case management, time tracking, legal workflows, team task delegation, client profiles with case history, and court date reminders.
I'll help you develop a comprehensive CRM for law firms. Let me start by understanding the current project structure and then build out this application with all the features you've requested.
